content: --अर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} corresponding to requirement, as many as may be required to convey the meaning (said of words); यावदर्थपदां वा मेवमादा य माधवः विरराम <ls>Śi. 2. 13.</ls> (--र्थं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} as much as useful. {2} in all senses; वयमपि च गिरामीश्महे यावदर्थं <ls>Bh. 3. 30</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>
